DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety investigational nasal aerosol compare placebo nasal aerosol treatment seasonal allergic rhinitis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Adult Adolescent Subjects With Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( SAR )
DOC.criteria: Informed Consent Male female subject 12 year age older Documented history season allergic rhinitis mountain cedar pollen General good health Other criterion apply History physical finding nasal pathology ( within 60 day prior screen visit ) Participation investigational drug study 30 day precede screen visit History respiratory infection/disorder 14 day precede screen visit Use prohibit concomitant medication Other criterion apply
